Classes/NativeAdListing.html#/s:vC20Pock.abstract: The amount of adListings that have been added.

Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:vC20Pocke.name: view
Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:vC20Pocke.abstract: The view we’re going to integrate the native ads in.

Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FC20Pocke.name: init(controller:view:adPlacementToken:customXib:adPosition:requester:)
Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FC20Pocke.abstract: Initializer of the Native Ad Stream way of implementing ads in existing UI Views.

Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FP20Pocke.name: didReceiveError(_:)
Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FP20Pocke.abstract: This method is called if something goes wrong retrieving the ads.s

Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FC20Pocke.name: didReceiveResults(_:)
Classes/NativeAdStream.html#/s:FC20Pocke.abstract: This method is called when we hear back from the server.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:vC20PocketMed.name: adUnit
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:vC20PocketMed.abstract: The AdUnitType defines what kind of ad is shown.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: getNativeAdListing(_:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Finds an ad listing for a given index path.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: getNativeAdListingHigherThan(_:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Finds an ad listing which is lower than the index path of the given one.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: getAdCell(_:indexPath:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Gets the view cell for this ad.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: onAdRequestSuccess(_:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Method that dictates what happens when a ad network request resulted successful. It should kick off what to do with this list of ads.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: registerNib(nib:identifier:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: This function checks if we have a cell registered with that name. If not we’ll register it.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.name: dequeueReusableCell(identifier:indexPath:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.abstract: This function checks if we have a cell registered with that name. If not we’ll register it.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.name: numberOfSections()
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.abstract: This function checks if we have a cell registered with that name. If not we’ll register it.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.name: numberOfRowsInSection(section:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FP20PocketMed.abstract: This function checks if we have a cell registered with that name. If not we’ll register it.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: setAdPositions(_:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: This method is responsible for going through a list of new ads and populating self.adListingsPerSection.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: clear()
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Call if you want to clear all the ads from the datasource.

Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.name: getOriginalPositionForElement(_:)
Classes/DataSource.html#/s:FC20PocketMed.abstract: Get the original position of a element on that indexRow. If we have an ad listed before this position normalize.

Classes/PocketMediaNativeAdsBundle.html#.name: loadBundle()
Classes/PocketMediaNativeAdsBundle.html#.abstract: Returns the Bundle of the PocketMediaNativeAds framework.

Classes/NativeAdCollectionViewDelegate.h.name: collectionView(_:didSelectItemAt:)
Classes/NativeAdCollectionViewDelegate.h.abstract: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index path was selected.

Classes/DataSource.html.name: DataSource
Classes/DataSource.html.abstract: Abstract class that defines the bare datasource functionality.

Classes/AdUnit.html.name: AdUnit
Classes/AdUnit.html.abstract: This object is used at the datasource to figure out what nib file to use.

Classes/NativeAdStream.html.name: NativeAdStream
Classes/NativeAdStream.html.abstract: This class is the entry point of easily integrating nativeAds in existing UI elements of the host.

Classes/NativeAdListing.html.name: NativeAdListing
Classes/NativeAdListing.html.abstract: Wraps around the native ad. It represents an ad displayed in a collection.

Classes/MarginAdPosition.html.name: MarginAdPosition
Classes/MarginAdPosition.html.abstract: This ad position implementation makes the ads show up at a set interval (margin).

Classes/PredefinedAdPosition.html.name: PredefinedAdPosition
Classes/PredefinedAdPosition.html.abstract: This ad position implementation makes the ads show up at certain predefined positions.

Classes/NativeAdTableViewDelegate.html.name: NativeAdTableViewDelegate
Classes/NativeAdTableViewDelegate.html.abstract: Wraps around a UITableViewDelegate delegate and adds the ad logic.

Classes/NativeAdsWebviewDelegate.html.name: NativeAdsWebviewDelegate
Classes/NativeAdsWebviewDelegate.html.abstract: Controls an instance of a webview. Adds a load indicator to give feedback back to the user.

Classes/FullscreenBrowser.html.name: FullscreenBrowser
Classes/FullscreenBrowser.html.abstract: Default controller class that is used to open the NativeAd in An Fullscreen Embedded WebView.

Classes/NativeAd.html.name: NativeAd
Classes/NativeAd.html.abstract: Model class. It contains all the attributes received from the API, and allows to open the click URL with a specific opener.

Classes/NativeAdTableViewDataSource.html.name: NativeAdTableViewDataSource
Classes/NativeAdTableViewDataSource.html.abstract: Wraps around a datasource so it contains both a mix of ads and none ads.

Classes/NativeAdCollectionViewDataSource.name: NativeAdCollectionViewDataSource
Classes/NativeAdCollectionViewDataSource.abstract: Wraps around a datasource so it contains both a mix of ads and none ads.
